title: 115_s2514
content: Preserving Access to Cost Effective Drugs Act or the PACED Act This bill prohibits patent owners from asserting tribal sovereign immunity as a defense in certain proceedings before the US Patent and Trademark Office, including patent validity challenge proceedings before the Patent Trial and Appeal Board (PTAB). The prohibition also applies to court actions and proceedingsnbsp. Before the International Trade Commission. Sovereign immunity for foreign states shall apply in the PTAB as it applies in federal court.
